name: timerange
info:
Lets through or blocks a payload
based on a time range. This can
either be configured through the
enviroment variables in the node ui
or as described below with a message
that has an override topic.
If in range the msg will be passed
to the first output and otherwise
to the second.
The start and stop time needs
to be defined in an hh:mm format.
There is also a week array. The week
starts on monday so 4 for example is
Thursday. Payload will only be passed
on days that are in the array.
Out of time range payloads will
be redirected to the second output.
The schedule can be overriden by injecting
a message with the topic of "override"
that contains a ```msg.payload``` object with the
keys of "start","stop","days" like
this:
```
{
    "start": "10:00",
    "stop": "14:00",
    "days": [
        1,
        2,
        3,
        4,
        5,
        6,
        7
    ]
}
```
Start and stop need to be strings in the hh:mm
format and days an array of numbers as
described above.
The override can be deleted by injecting a
msg.payload string "reset".

name: Conversions
func:
msg.data.main.temp = ((msg.data.main.temp - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.feels_like = ((msg.data.main.feels_like - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.temp_min = ((msg.data.main.temp_min - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.temp_max = ((msg.data.main.temp_max - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.pressure = msg.data.main.pressure * 0.029529983071445
msg.data.wind.speed = msg.data.wind.speed * 2.237
msg.data.wind.gust = msg.data.wind.gust * 2.237
return msg;

name: Rounding
func:
var temp = msg.data.main.temp
var feels_like = msg.data.main.feels_like
var temp_min = msg.data.main.temp_min
var temp_max = msg.data.main.temp_max
var pressure = msg.data.main.pressure
var windspeed = msg.data.wind.speed
var windgust = msg.data.wind.gust

msg.data.main.temp = +temp.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.feels_like = +feels_like.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.temp_min = +temp_min.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.temp_max = +temp_max.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.pressure = +pressure.toFixed(2)
msg.data.wind.speed = +windspeed.toFixed(2)
msg.data.wind.gust = +windgust.toFixed(2)

return msg;

name: Processing
Format
func:
const tpc = msg.topic
const pld = msg.payload
var dest = tpc.replaceAll("_"," ")
var scene = pld.replaceAll("_"," ")

msg.topic = dest
msg.payload = scene

return msg

name: Announce
func:
var states = global.get('homeassistant.homeAssistant.states')
var room = states['input_select.kallen_activity_room'].state
var activity = states['input_select.kallen_activities'].state
var minutes = states['sensor.kallen_timer_remaining_minutes'].state
var seconds = states['sensor.kallen_timer_remaining_seconds'].state

msg.room = room
msg.activity = activity
msg.remainingmin = minutes
msg.remainingsec = seconds

node.status({ fill: "green", shape: "dot", text: "Sent" });

return msg;

func:
var states = global.get('homeassistant.homeAssistant.states')
var message = states['input_text.tts_message'].state
var who = states['input_select.tts_devices'].state
var voice = states['input_select.announcement_voice'].state
const resetMessage = 'Words go here and stuff'
const resetWho = 'Living Room'
const resetVoice = global.get("jarvis_voice")

msg.payload = message
msg.topic = who
msg.voice = voice

msg.reset_message = resetMessage
msg.reset_who = resetWho
msg.reset_voice = resetVoice

node.status({fill:"green",shape:"dot",text:voice + " speaking in " + who});

return msg;

name: Processing
Media?
Processing
Init
func:
const states = global.get('homeassistant.homeAssistant.states')
const michigan_wolverines = states['sensor.michigan_wolverines']
const ohio_state_buckeyes = states['sensor.ohio_state_buckeyes']
const toledo_rockets = states['sensor.toledo_rockets']
const minnesota_vikings = states['sensor.minnesota_vikings']
const san_francisco_49ers = states['sensor.san_francisco_49ers']
const cleveland_guardians = states['sensor.cleveland_guardians']
const minnesota_twins = states['sensor.minnesota_twins']
const los_angeles_dodgers = states['sensor.los_angeles_dodgers']

const michigan_wolverines_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.michigan_wolverines_inhibit'].state
const ohio_state_buckeyes_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.ohio_state_buckeyes_inhibit'].state
const toledo_rockets_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.toledo_rockets_inhibit'].state
const minnesota_vikings_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.minnesota_vikings_inhibit'].state
const san_francisco_49ers_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.san_francisco_49ers_inhibit'].state
const cleveland_guardians_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.cleveland_guardians_inhibit'].state
const minnesota_twins_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.minnesota_twins_inhibit'].state
const los_angeles_dodgers_inhibit = states['binary_sensor.los_angeles_dodgers_inhibit'].state

flow.set("michigan_wolverines", michigan_wolverines)
flow.set("ohio_state_buckeyes", ohio_state_buckeyes)
flow.set("toledo_rockets", toledo_rockets)
flow.set("minnesota_vikings", minnesota_vikings)
flow.set("san_francisco_49ers", san_francisco_49ers)
flow.set("cleveland_guardians", cleveland_guardians)
flow.set("minnesota_twins", minnesota_twins)
flow.set("los_angeles_dodgers", los_angeles_dodgers)

flow.set("michigan_wolverines_inhibit", michigan_wolverines_inhibit)
flow.set("ohio_state_buckeyes_inhibit", ohio_state_buckeyes_inhibit)
flow.set("toledo_rockets_inhibit", toledo_rockets_inhibit)
flow.set("minnesota_vikings_inhibit", minnesota_vikings_inhibit)
flow.set("san_francisco_49ers_inhibit", san_francisco_49ers_inhibit)
flow.set("cleveland_guardians_inhibit", cleveland_guardians_inhibit)
flow.set("minnesota_twins_inhibit", minnesota_twins_inhibit)
flow.set("los_angeles_dodgers_inhibit", los_angeles_dodgers_inhibit)

name: Init
func:
const states = global.get('homeassistant.homeAssistant.states')
const team = msg.activeEvent
const lower = team.toLowerCase()
const convert = lower.replaceAll(" ", "_")
const sensor = "sensor." + convert
const getInhibitSensor = "binary_sensor." + convert + "_inhibit"
const inhibit = states[getInhibitSensor].state
const teamSensor = states[sensor]

flow.set("team", convert)
flow.set("inhibit", inhibit)
flow.set("teamSensor", teamSensor)

node.status({fill:"green",shape:"dot",text:"Team: " + team})
